text:
Just need to add a few conversions using 'cygpath'.  Here are the diffs for
catalina.sh version 4.04.  The /cygdrive stuff is a nuisance, but it far better
than being constrained to using MS-DOS command line.

bash-2.05b$ diff catalina.sh.orig jakarta-tomcat-4.0.4/bin/catalina.sh 
99c99
<   JAVA_HOME=`cygpath --path --windows "$JAVA_HOME"`
---
>   CATALINA_BASE=`cygpath --path --windows "$CATALINA_BASE"`
101a102,104
>   CATALINA_TMPDIR=`cygpath --path --windows "$CATALINA_TMPDIR"`
>   JAVA_ENDORSED_DIRS=`cygpath --path --windows "$JAVA_ENDORSED_DIRS"`
>   JAVA_HOME=`cygpath --path --windows "$JAVA_HOME"`
107,110c110,115
< echo "Using CATALINA_BASE:   $CATALINA_BASE"
< echo "Using CATALINA_HOME:   $CATALINA_HOME"
< echo "Using CATALINA_TMPDIR: $CATALINA_TMPDIR"
< echo "Using JAVA_HOME:       $JAVA_HOME"
---
> echo "Using CATALINA_BASE:      $CATALINA_BASE"
> echo "Using CATALINA_HOME:      $CATALINA_HOME"
> echo "Using CATALINA_TMPDIR:    $CATALINA_TMPDIR"
> echo "Using CLASSPATH:          $CLASSPATH"
> echo "Using JAVA_ENDORSED_DIRS: $JAVA_ENDORSED_DIRS"
> echo "Using JAVA_HOME:          $JAVA_HOME"
